[Home](./index.md) &gt; [opengsq-node](./opengsq-node.md) &gt; [ServerInfo](./opengsq-node.serverinfo.md)

## ServerInfo interface

Represents the server information returned by the A2S\_INFO query. This interface supports both Source Engine and Obsolete GoldSource responses.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ServerInfo 
```

## Properties
